pf2e-extempore-effects.descriptionOfQuickUntitledEffect:
(Generated Effect)

Write whatever you want in here!

randomize-image-if-default.name: Prefer random images over default images
randomize-image-if-default.hint:
Default true.  When creating an effect out of a message that has an item but no actor (or has an actor with
    the default art), and that item has default art, pick a random colorful effect image instead.

hidden-by-default.name: Create unidentified effects by default
hidden-by-default.hint:
Default false.  When creating an effect with the module as a GM it will not default to "unidentified" (secret).
     Holding the Ctrl/Alt button while creating an effect will reverse this (making it secret by default).

quick-add-empty-effect.name: Quick add empty effect
quick-add-empty-effect.hint: Create a new custom effect with a random icon, applied to the currently selected token

open-effect-sheet-shortcut.name: Open Effect Sheet shortcut
open-effect-sheet-shortcut.hint: If not disabled, you can use this to open the effect's sheet when creating an Extempore Effect and when using the effects panel.

notifications-for-expired-effects.name: Notifications for expired events
notifications-for-expired-effects.hint: Effects that expire will send a notification and a chat message, as a reminder

notifications-sound-for-expired-effects.name: Notification sound for expired events
notifications-sound-for-expired-effects.hint: Play a sound when an effect expires and notifications are enabled.

notifications-pause-for-expired-effects.name: Pause clock advancement to first expired effect
notifications-pause-for-expired-effects.hint: Only advance the clock to the first expired effect notification and display a dialog to continue or cancel the advancement of the clock.

pf2e-extempore-effects.errorMultipleTokensCustomEffect: You need to have one token selected to apply a custom new effect.
pf2e-extempore-effects.errorNoTokensSelected: You need to have token(s) selected to apply the effect.
pf2e-extempore-effects.errorItemNotFound: Item not found in PF2e message.

content.message-time: The clock was only advanced by
content.message-continue: Do you want to continue advancing time for the remaining
